Summary: Nonexistent id linked to an existing symbol
Description:
References to nonexistent foo::pkg::bar (foo is an empty package) Verilate without errors if a package pkg with a variable static int bar exists.
If foo::pkg::bar does exist, it has priority over pkg::bar, as expected.
Here is an example in test_regress format.
Tested with the latest commit (5fce23e) on Fedora, Linux 6.0.14.
